verses.verse: And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all his <S%H2428>host<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%>: and there were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> with him, and <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>: and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H3898>warred<s%> against it.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%>,
Thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> and thy <S%H2091>gold<s%> is mine; thy <S%H802>wives<s%> also and thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, even the <S%H2896>goodliest<s%>, are mine.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, according to thy <S%H1697>saying<s%>, I am thine, and all that I have.

And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus <S%H559>speaketh<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Although I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me thy <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and thy <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and thy <S%H802>wives<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>children<s%>;

Yet I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto thee to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%>, and they shall <S%H2664>search<s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%>, that whatsoever is <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and take it <S%H3947>away<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3045>Mark<s%>, I pray you, and <S%H7200>see<s%> how this man <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%>: for he <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto me for my <S%H802>wives<s%>, and for my <S%H1121>children<s%>, and for my <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and for my <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and I <S%H4513>denied<s%> him not.
And all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> not unto him, nor <S%H14>consent<s%>.

Wherefore he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%>, <S%H559>Tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, All that thou didst <S%H7971>send<s%> for to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%>: but this <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H6213>do<s%>. And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H430>gods<s%> do <S%H6213>so<s%> unto me, and more <S%H3254>also<s%>, if the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H5606>suffice<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> me.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1696>Tell<s%> him, Let not him that <S%H2296>girdeth<s%> on his harness <S%H1984>boast<s%> himself as he that putteth it <S%H6605>off<s%>.

And it came to pass, when Ben-hadad <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>message<s%>, as he was <S%H8354>drinking<s%>, he and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7760>Set<s%> yourselves in array. And they <S%H7760>set<s%> themselves in array against the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

¶ And, behold, there <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>? behold, I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, By whom? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Even by the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%>. Then he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who shall <S%H631>order<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%>? And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, Thou.

Then he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%>, and they were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%>: and <S%H310>after<s%> them he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, even all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, being <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And they went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>. But <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> was <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions<s%>, he and the <S%H4428>kings<s%>, the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H5826>helped<s%> him.

And the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>; and <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> sent <S%H7971>out<s%>, and they <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There are <S%H582>men<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Whether they be come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%>; or whether they be come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%>.
So these young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H2428>army<s%> which <S%H310>followed<s%> them.

And they <S%H5221>slew<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H376>man<s%>: and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them: and <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> on an <S%H5483>horse<s%> with the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> thyself, and <S%H3045>mark<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what thou <S%H6213>doest<s%>: for at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> will come <S%H5927>up<s%> against thee.

And the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Their <S%H430>gods<s%> are <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills<s%>; therefore they were <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than we; <S%H199>but<s%> let us <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them in the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and <S%H3808>surely<s%> we shall be <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than they.

And <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, <S%H5493>Take<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> away, every <S%H376>man<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6346>captains<s%> in their rooms:

And <S%H4487>number<s%> thee an <S%H2428>army<s%>, like the <S%H2428>army<s%> that thou hast <S%H5307>lost<s%>, <S%H5483>horse<s%> for <S%H5483>horse<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariot<s%> for <S%H7393>chariot<s%>: and we will <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> them in the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and surely we shall be <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than they. And he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and did <S%H6213>so<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, that <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek<s%>, to <S%H4421>fight<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, and were all <S%H3557>present<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> before them like <S%H8147>two<s%> little <S%H2835>flocks<s%> of <S%H5795>kids<s%>; but the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H5066>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Because the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> have <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, but he is not <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H6010>valleys<s%>, therefore will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H428>one<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H428>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>. And so it was, that in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H7126>joined<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But the <S%H3498>rest<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek<s%>, into the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and there a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>. And <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, into an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>chamber<s%>.

¶ And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold now, we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>: let us, I pray thee, <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on our <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H2256>ropes<s%> upon our <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: peradventure he will <S%H2421>save<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>.

So they <S%H2296>girded<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on their <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and put <S%H2256>ropes<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, I pray thee, let me <S%H2421%H5315>live<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Is he yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>? he is my <S%H251>brother<s%>.

Now the <S%H582>men<s%> did diligently <S%H5172>observe<s%> whether any thing would come from him, and did <S%H4116>hastily<s%> <S%H2480>catch<s%> it: and they <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%>. Then he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> ye, <S%H3947>bring<s%> him. Then <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> to him; and he caused him to come <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H4818>chariot<s%>.

And Ben-hadad <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> from thy <S%H1>father<s%>, I will <S%H7725>restore<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H2351>streets<s%> for thee in <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, as my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>. Then said Ahab, I will send thee <S%H7971>away<s%> with this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>. So he <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him, and sent him <S%H7971>away<s%>.

¶ And a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> in the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H5221>Smite<s%> me, I pray thee. And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> him.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto him, Because thou hast not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, behold, as soon as thou art <S%H1980>departed<s%> from me, a <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> thee. And as soon as he was <S%H3212>departed<s%> from <S%H681>him<s%>, a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> him.

Then he <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5221>Smite<s%> me, I pray thee. And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, so that in <S%H5221>smiting<s%> he <S%H6481>wounded<s%> him.

So the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H5975>waited<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself with <S%H666>ashes<s%> upon his <S%H5869>face<s%>.

And as the <S%H4428>king<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, he <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4421>battle<s%>; and, behold, a <S%H376>man<s%> turned <S%H5493>aside<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> unto me, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8104>Keep<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%>: if by any <S%H6485>means<s%> he be <S%H6485>missing<s%>, then shall thy <S%H5315>life<s%> be for his <S%H5315>life<s%>, or else thou shalt <S%H8254>pay<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And as thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> was <S%H6213>busy<s%> here and there, he was <S%H369>gone<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, So shall thy <S%H4941>judgment<s%> be; thyself hast <S%H2782>decided<s%> it.

And he <S%H4116>hasted<s%>, and took the <S%H666>ashes<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from his <S%H5869>face<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5234>discerned<s%> him that he was of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Because thou hast let <S%H7971>go<s%> out of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> whom I appointed to utter <S%H2764>destruction<s%>, therefore thy <S%H5315>life<s%> shall go for his <S%H5315>life<s%>, and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5620>heavy<s%> and <S%H2198>displeased<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.
